review_data.title: Breakfast

review_data.title: Good for a quiet and healthy breakfast
review_data.content: The cafe is nicely decorated Swedish style and is a good place for breakfast. The food is freshly prepared on site and offers vegan alternatives. It’s not cheap but is relatively in line with Zurich prices.

review_data.title: Solid healthy food
review_data.content: Had several lunches here working in the area because of the nice fresh salads with excellent fresh ingredients. The ambiance is pleasant and the prices very reasonable.

review_data.title: Very good, affordable lunch menus
review_data.content: This modern place offers great value set menu lunch dishes ranging from CHF15 - CHF20. Some of the dishes, albeit tasty, do not seem to be prepared fresh and are instead reheated, for example lasagne.

review_data.title: Relaxing breakfasts
review_data.content: Spent two mornings here for breakfast. Very clean and spacious. Very friendly staff and understanding of english. Their yogurt and muesli very satisfying for the days sightseeing.
